body:
Welcome! UHC's are back :D Decided to post this ahead of time so others in other timezones are able to make time for this.
Information: http://avicus.net/forums/6aaf332fa
I will bump this 1 day before the event.
See you there :D

#24 Scenario: Slave Market
Each player will be bidded on by 4 Bidders, Chosen at random , The Bidders will be given 20 diamonds. Remaining diamonds may be used during the match.
Spend Wisely!

Announcement: The match will happen on Friday, March 13, around 5-6PM Eastern Standard Time.

replies.body: Sorry for not knowing about this but, how does a UHC go? How do you play slave market? Why does it seem like everyone knows how to play except me?
replies.body_tagged: Sorry for not knowing about this but, how does a UHC go? How do you play slave market? Why does it seem like everyone knows how to play except me?

replies.body:
You buy bitches to fight for you I think.

A UHC is Ultra hardcore mode. No natural regen, only regen from pots and gapples heal you
replies.body_tagged:
You buy bitches to fight for you I think.

A UHC is Ultra hardcore mode. No natural regen, only regen from pots and gapples heal you

replies.body: yes!
replies.body_tagged: yes!

replies.body: I am hoping I can make it, UHC is my favourite gamemode and where my pvp part is  strongest. Any more clues on time? It would help, Thanks :P
replies.body_tagged: I am hoping I can make it, UHC is my favourite gamemode and where my pvp part is  strongest. Any more clues on time? It would help, Thanks :P

replies.body:
Trexy explained the UHC part, only part left out is, you can use player heads that you kill for a Golden Head to heal 4 hearts instead of 2. (You replace the apple with a head when making a golden apple). Also, ghast tears are disabled to prevent the brewing of regeneration potions.
Slave Market is explained in the OP.
replies.body_tagged:
